about_the_game:
Manufactured from 1988 until 1989 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with block brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Poland,Czech Republic and Germany.

They were totally modernised at "Remarul 16 Februarie Pascani" factory in Romania, were equipped with HVAC, automatic doors, new windows and completely new interior.

Pack includes:

*6 modernised doubledecker car with photorealistic textures

*5 custom realistic full interiors(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Full PBR textures

*Emmisive glow lights on nightmode

*HVAC sound and animated fan

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogeysounds

*Interior & exterior nightmode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station

Manufactured from 1988 until 1989 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with block brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Poland,Czech Republic and Germany.

They were totally modernised at "Remarul 16 Februarie Pascani" factory in Romania, were equipped with HVAC, automatic doors, new windows and completely new interior.

Pack includes:

*6 modernised doubledecker car with photorealistic textures

*5 custom realistic full interiors(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Full PBR textures

*Emmisive glow lights on nightmode

*HVAC sound and animated fan

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Manufactured in 1988/89 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Romania, and many have been modernised. This pack features 6 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
